text: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan jikalau Kami menghendaki pastilah Kami ubah mereka di tempat mereka berada; maka mereka tidak sanggup berjalan lagi dan tidak (pula) sanggup kembali.
